fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- A Koopa King will not spawn naturally. At the start of the game, a coronation will be held, Town starts with 1 extra member at the cost of a REF slot and Koopa members may vote for someone to instantly become a random Koopa King, if the target is Conversion Immune or a Neutral, Koopas must repick.
- Factional chat.
- No factional kill, but a Factional attacker is chosen each night, Koopa Killings and All-rounders who weren't chosen will have their Attack reduced to None, A Support or Protective Koopa may also be chosen, they will gain a Basic attack ability that night.
- If the faction is down to the last member alive, they may multitask the factional kill.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose Lord Bowser.
